title: Welcome to the Farm
description: Learn the basics of farm life and how to move around

phases.title: Meeting the Family
phases.description: Get to know your responsibilities on the farm

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Hey Qubit! Welcome to Grandpa's farm. He's asked us to take care of things while he's away.

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Oh, don't worry. You'll love it once you get the hang of it. Trust me, there's a method to all this.

phases.title: Learning to Move
phases.description: Practice moving around the farm using arrow keys

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: First things first - let's get you moving around. Use the ARROW KEYS to walk in all four directions.

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Yes! Try pressing UP, DOWN, LEFT, and RIGHT. Get comfortable with moving - you'll be doing a lot of it.

objectives.description: Move in all four directions using arrow keys
Move in all four directions using arrow keys

postDialogues.name: Maru
postDialogues.content: Perfect! See? You're a natural already.

postDialogues.name: Maru
postDialogues.content: Baby steps, Qubit. Baby steps. Now, let's talk about what we actually need to do around here...

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: So here's the deal - Grandpa needs us to grow wheat. Plant seeds, wait for them to grow, then harvest.

preDialogues.name: Qubit
preDialogues.content: That sounds like a lot of waiting around.

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Well... yes and no. That's where things get interesting. You've learned the fundamentals - now let's put them to use!

preDialogues.name: Qubit
preDialogues.content: Alright, I've got the basics down. I'm ready to start farming!

preDialogues.name: Maru
preDialogues.content: Perfect! You've completed the introduction! Welcome to farm life, Qubit. Let's grow some wheat!
